entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException: Index was out of range when using AsSplitQuery() #25680
    customer-reported

Closed

  • Cascade delete in table per type(TPT) #24622
    closed-by-design, customer-reported, area-model-building
  • Migrations keep adding the same column over and over #25005
    type-bug, closed-fixed, customer-reported, area-model-building, area-migrations, 6.0.0
  • ArgumentException with Complex Delegation of Compiled Query #25679
    closed-question, customer-reported
  • Concurrency state issues with split query #25225
    type-bug, closed-fixed, customer-reported, area-query, community-contribution, 6.0.0-rc1
  • "Possible null reference return" in auto-generated compiled model #25647
    type-bug, closed-fixed, customer-reported, area-model-building, 6.0.0
  • Migrations not writing actual migration #25677
    customer-reported
  • Scaffold-DbContext with UseDatabaseNames options not working correctly #25503
    closed-could-not-reproduce, customer-reported
  • Query: cast + include fails on TPT #22691
    type-bug, closed-fixed, area-query, 6.0.0
  • Updating embedded ICollection HashSet causes unchanged items to be removed from the context #25610
    closed-question, customer-reported
  • Can't explicit load many-to-many relationships. #24329
    type-bug, closed-fixed, customer-reported, area-query
  • Dependency issues between visitors #20445
    closed-wont-fix, punted-for-5.0, risky
  • Delete unacceptable symbols from query parameter #19481
    closed-wont-fix, customer-reported
  • ValueConverter does not work well with HasData #21558
    closed-could-not-reproduce
  • Cosmos: wrap more exceptions with DbUpdateException #25631
    type-bug, area-cosmos, area-save-changes, 6.0.0
  • Unexcepted result when use .Contains() in .Where() #25644
    closed-could-not-reproduce, customer-reported
  • Recursive Hierarchy in self referenced table - ef core 5 #25649
    closed-duplicate, customer-reported
  • Inverse property mapping ignores namespace in partial class property #25565
    type-bug, closed-fixed, customer-reported, area-model-building, 6.0.0-preview7
  • Set TPH discriminator value correctly when discriminator is part of the primary key #21206
    type-bug, closed-fixed, customer-reported, area-change-tracking, 6.0.0
  • Detect unknown shadow primary key values when attempting to save owned collection #19856
    type-bug, closed-fixed, customer-reported, area-model-building, area-change-tracking, punted-for-5.0, 6.0.0
  • Projection of Owned entities and aggregation in same query fails with System.InvalidCastException / System.ArgumentException #24133
    type-bug, closed-fixed, customer-reported, area-query, 6.0.0
  • Contains on a readonly collection throws InvalidOperation exception. #18658
    type-bug, closed-fixed, customer-reported, area-query, 6.0.0

Updated

  • Don't use dynamic code at runtime #24903
    type-enhancement, area-global, Backlog
  • Foreign key facets are not propagated from the principal properties #15339
    type-bug, closed-fixed, customer-reported, punted-for-3.0, area-model-building, 6.0.0
  • Query/Test: convert remaining complex nav collection tests to AssertQuery #24708
    type-enhancement, area-test, closed-fixed, customer-reported, area-query, 6.0.0
  • SelectMany with nested navigation throws #12329
    type-bug, closed-fixed, customer-reported, punted-for-3.0, area-query, 6.0.0
  • InvalidOperationException when projection is used with OData #24092
    type-bug, customer-reported, area-query, 6.0.0
  • Support flexible entity type to function mapping #19970
    type-enhancement, area-relational-mapping, Backlog
  • Query with nested select statement no longer work in EF Core 3.0 when using owned types #18582
    type-bug, closed-fixed, customer-reported, area-query, 6.0.0
  • Cosmos: bad exception for queries with aggregate selecting non-mapped type #20677
    type-bug, area-query, area-cosmos, punted-for-6.0, cosmos-query-refactor, Backlog
  • SharedTypeQueryRelationalTestBase does not delimit identifiers in raw SQL #25661
    type-bug, area-test, 6.0.0
  • Improve exception message for projection with JSON field conversion #21602
    type-bug, customer-reported, verify-fixed, area-query, 6.0.0
  • Support scaffolding models and context to separate projects #7847
    type-enhancement, Backlog
  • Support loading recursive relationships to any depth #14144
    type-enhancement, customer-reported, Backlog
  • Allow owned entities on a keyless entity type #17890
    type-enhancement, propose-close, customer-reported, area-model-building, Backlog
  • Query: add translation for string.IndexOf(string, int) #25396
    type-enhancement, good first issue, area-query, Backlog
  • Including sub-collection for derived type returns repeating items #22016
    type-bug, customer-reported, area-query

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0] Update dependencies from dotnet/runtime #25692
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Add MigrationsModelDiffer tests for propagating facets #25691
  • Fix to #24708 - Query/Test: convert remaining complex nav collection tests to AssertQuery #25690
  • Query: Add regression test for #12329 #25687
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #25686
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Query: Add regression test for #18582 #25685

Merged

  • [release/6.0-rc1] Update dependencies from dotnet/runtime #25689
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • [release/6.0] Update dependencies from dotnet/runtime #25688
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • [release/6.0-rc1] Update dependencies from dotnet/runtime #25684
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Add a check to TryAddProviderSpecificServices #25674
  • Fix nullability in compiled model #25676
  • [release/6.0-rc1] Fix #25225 by forcing usage of renting and populating commands when using relational command cache #25668
    Servicing-approved, community-contribution, 6.0.0-rc1
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #25683
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [release/6.0-rc1] Remove unused nullability in typeof #25664
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.0-rc1
  • Query: Re-enable fixed test #25673
  • [release/6.0-rc1] Update dependencies from dotnet/runtime #25682
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • [release/6.0] Update dependencies from dotnet/runtime #25681
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • [release/6.0] Update dependencies from dotnet/runtime #25678
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #25663
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Fix Cosmos update exception wrapping #25651
  • More links to conceptual docs #25658
  • Detect unknown shadow primary key values when attempting to save owned collection #25652
  • [release/6.0] Update dependencies from dotnet/runtime #25675
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Query: Add regression test for #24133 #25672
  • Query: Add regression test for #18658 #25671
